Simple, robust rules compatible with decades of Basic/Expert material. See the website for more about Old-School Essentials.

Old-School Essentials is a trademark of Necrotic Gnome, permitted for use under contract.

Report your issues on our Github issue tracker or by using the Bug Reporter module in Foundry VTT.

This game system is open source! Brought to life on Foundry VTT by U~man. Currently maintained by VTT Red. See the project page for a full list of contributors and license info.
